title: Community-Based Research Design Workshop for Preventing Adolescent Alcohol Abuse

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic social science research methodologies, lack of experience in community education projects
context.additional_context: A competency-building program for pre-service teachers, utilizing a mobile-optimized LMS. Experiencing co-production-style research design for solving community issues

learning_goals: Development of a community alcohol abuse problem analysis framework through youth participatory research design.
Establishment of collaborative problem-solving strategies with youth by applying a co-production research process.
Writing team-based research proposals in a mobile LMS environment and incorporating peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
